sorcer.core.monitor

Interface MonitorUIManagement

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MonitoringManagement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExertMonitor

    public interface MonitorUIManagement
    An interface for UI to interact with the monitor. Get all the refIDs and monitored exertion info for a particular credential. The refID will be the combination of serviceID which is globally unique and the referenceID for the exertion. This referenceID is also required by the monitorable to be passed back to the MonitorableServicer (ie, the MonitorManager) to control the exertion execution. The spec requires that the implementation of this interface gets all the monitored exertions for the particular user credentials.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Exertion getMonitorableExertion(UEID cookie, Principal credentials)
      For this reference ID, which references a exertion in a monitor, get the exertion if the principal has enough credentials.
      Exertion getMonitorableExertion(Uuid id, Principal credentials)
      For this reference ID, which references a exertion in a datastore, get the exertion if the client has enough credentials.
      Map<Uuid,ExertionInfo> getMonitorableExertionInfo(ExecState.Category aspect, Principal principal)
      The spec requires that this method gets all the monitorable exertion infos from all the monitor managers and return a Hashtable where key -> ExertionReferenceID value -> Some info regarding this exertion

    • Method Detail

                                                Principal principal)
                                                  throws RemoteException,

        RemoteException - if there is a communication error

      • getMonitorableExertion

        Exertion getMonitorableExertion(UEID cookie,

                                throws RemoteException,
                                       MonitorException
        For this reference ID, which references a exertion in a monitor, get the exertion if the principal has enough credentials.

        MonitorException - if the client does not have enough credentials.
